objects.query: SELECT Id, Org__c, Name, Type__c, Weight__c, Quantity__c, UserType__c, AssignmentType__c FROM LM_ProductLicense__c
SELECT Id, Name, ProductLicense__c, Query__c FROM LM_ProductLicensePersona__c

SELECT Id, ProductLicense__c, Project__c, Domain__c, BoardOfDirectors__c, VicePresidency__c, Price__c, Quantity__c, PurchaseDate__c, ContractStartDate__c, ContractEndDate__c, IsActive__c FROM LM_ProductLicensePurchaseCondition__c
SELECT Id, ProductLicense__c, IsActive__c, LastLoginDate__c, Username__c, UniqueConstraint__c FROM LM_ProductLicenseUserAssignment__c
